attributes.action: Create a discount rail card for people aged 30 to 60
attributes.additional_details: Those in this age bracket are often professionals who have to travel frequently. Outside of family and two together rail cards, there is no rail card nationally available that enables single people travel individually between the ages of 31 to 60 at a discount. In view of the current surge in prices, a discount rail card of 30% would be appreciated.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to influence a change by requesting that train operators provide rail cards for those between the ages of 31 to 60.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639493
